column4: hey I need some help with my resolution, my monitor is capable and suppose to be at 1600x900 and such, I know the nvidia card can handle it, the other monitor I had showed resolutions far beyond this
it says its a "crt" and wont let me pick anything higher than 1024x768
please it is butt ugly
what video card do you have ?
nvidia 8400GS with 1g of GDDR3
have you enabled the propritary nvidia drivers from the "additional drivers" tool ?
no I am a complete retard
drop the smart mouth a.) I didn't see you say that b.) which drivers ?
I'm more than capable, so answer the questions
which drivers did you enable ?
did it give a version number in the menu ?
(it probably didn't I'm just checking)
ok, so first thing first, have you rebooted ?
why is that obvious ?
I'm asking reasonable questions, if you can't answer without a smart mouth it's pointless progressing
that doesn't mean you've rebooted, that means you're having ap roblem
have you rebooted since you used the hardware drivers tool to enable the nvidia drivers ?
so answer the questions, don't need the smart comments
I don't think a reboot would fix it, I was just trying to get the status of your machine, to start trouble shooting it
I didn't see the older posts,
good luck resolving your issue, I'm out
can you please forward me one of the requests
just pm/cut and paste
that's your problem to figure out now, I'll deal with your spam issue, thank you for reporting it
